SummaryEnglish: " Last Word of the World " is adapted from the popular manga of the same name on Kuaikan Comics. Set in a new world where the two major factions, the Cyborgs and the Beast Spirits, vie for dominance, the story follows the protagonist, Hei Tong Shi (Black-Eyed Rock), who inherits the will of his old friend. To resolve the conflicts between these two factions, the main characters embark on a journey to unlock the information hidden in the masks within four sacred temples located in the Beast Spirit territory. Their goal is to find the legendary "White Statue" and use its powers to restore peace and end all disputes in the world.
Aliases: Peach and the Book of the Apocalypse
Peach and the Book of the End of the World
